owner_summaries.key_concerns: Entity-level TB balances not zeroed, high flux analysis exceptions
High AP and AR reconciliation exceptions

residual_risks.description: Entity-level TB balances not zeroed, indicating potential misstatements
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement stricter review processes and automated checks

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential operational inefficiencies
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance data validation and variance analysis procedures

residual_risks.description: High AP and AR reconciliation exceptions could lead to compliance issues
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Increase frequency of reconciliations and implement exception reporting
